articles.title: Singapore PM backs continued exclusion of Myanmar junta from ASEAN meetings - Reuters
articles.description: Singapore's leader said the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) should continue excluding Myanmar's junta from its meeting until it cooperates on an agreed peace plans.
